attributes.action:
Stop regulation and fare increases 
In the taxi trade in Barrow Cumbria.
attributes.background: The cost of a taxi ride in Barrow in Furness Cumbria will rise if we don't stop the local council from continuing unnecessary regulation in the taxi trade, additional costs to the trade will increase costs to the public and will put taxi drivers out of business, this will put the public at risk.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Regulation of taxis is the responsibility of your local council. 
 
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
